continent.name: Asia
continent.discription: From the nomadic steppes of Kazakhstan to the frenetic streets of Hanoi, Asia is a continent so full of intrigue, adventure, solace and spirituality that it has fixated and confounded travellers for centuries.

country.name: Sri Lanka
country.discription: Endless beaches, timeless ruins, welcoming people, oodles of elephants, rolling surf, cheap prices, fun trains, famous tea and flavourful food make Sri Lanka irresistible.

country.name: Thailand
country.discription: Friendly and cheerful, exotic and tropical, cultural and historical. Thailand shines with the golden glow of beautiful temples, tropical beaches and the ever-present Thai smile.

country.name: Japan
country.discription: Japan is truly timeless, a place where ancient traditions are fused with modern life as if it were the most natural thing in the world.
